item.title: Refraction 2
item.dc:creator: Zach
item.description: So what have we been doing you might ask? Well, there hasn’t been much activity here (primarily because we assume almost no one reads this) but we have been busy. Work on the Android version of Refraction stopped around August on v1.8.4. We, like any eager developers, wanted to expand and take our successes elsewhere. […]

item.title: It’s been a while
item.dc:creator: Brandon
item.description: I think the last post I did talked about how we were going to get so much done this summer and how active we were going to be. Oy, I overestimated our ability to juggle responsibilities ;). We did work on a lot, but I also feel like development slowed quite a bit, perhaps because […]

item.title: Reddit Username Verification
item.dc:creator: Zach
item.description: For verification that we are who we say we are on reddit, our user names are: slick50zd1 brandonrisell lmao_zebong (this post will be removed once we are done with it)

item.title: The Refraction Story (aka ‘The Blind Leading the Blind’)
item.dc:creator: Zach
item.description: Origins: About a year or so ago Sean and Brandon had been trying to get a project started that would help elevate them above the above the sea of computer science major’s when it came to job application time. It initially went nowhere. Fast forward to late 2010, I (Zach) met Sean, and reintroduced myself […]
